name.value: Nictiz MedMij GGZ - PHR Client - Scenario 1.1 - Retrieve GGZ

description.value: MedMij GGZ for FHIR STU3 - Scenario 1.1: Retrieve GGZ - All GGZ resources of person 1. Response consists of 49 resources.

Test PHR Client retrieve search operation for known Patient resource of XXX-Bals including the patient's general practitioner. The expected response code is 200(OK) and content is a searchset Bundle resource with 2 entries.
PHR Server retrieve search operation for known Patient, including the referenced Practitioner or Organization resource.
Confirm that the client did not request a Content-Type. Warning only to allow for systems that automatically send Content-Type.
Confirm that HTTP header Authorization contains the patient token ${patient-token-id}
Confirm that the Observation query parameter 'patient=' was not present to avoid BSNs in the URL.
Confirm that the Observation query parameter 'subject=' was not present to avoid BSNs in the URL.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 2 entries.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that all returned resources contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
